Second longest barrier reef in the world
Published WRI economic valuation with breakdown by service type

demo_value.investor_story: The Belize Barrier Reef Reserve System demonstrates how blue finance mechanisms can scale. TNC's $364M debt conversion - the world's largest for ocean conservation - reduced Belize's national debt by 12% of GDP while securing $180M over 20 years for marine protection. With reef, mangrove, and seagrass services contributing $293-401M/year to the economy (12-15% of GDP), the investment case is clear: healthy marine ecosystems are bankable assets. Nereus rates Belize AA - strong fundamentals with the world's most advanced blue finance structure.
